name: ai-for-education
description: AI-powered educational platform with document processing and learning features

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:integration: cd backend && npm run test:integration && cd ../frontend && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test:watch" "cd frontend && npm run test:watch"
scripts.install-deps: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install-deps && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start the application.'
